title: Calendar Watchface
summary: A Watchface that displays your calendar events along the edge of the clock face
description: Calendar Watchface is a simple watchface for Android Wear that displays your calendar events along the circumference of the clock face. descriptionHTML:
Calendar Watchface is a simple watchface for Android Wear that displays your calendar events along the circumference of the clock face. This gives you your daily schedule at a glance, making sure you never miss an important event!

Your next event is shown at the bottom, along with it's location and the current date, while all-day events are shown at the top, if you have any.

Using the mobile settings app you can customize:
- Clock style: numbers or lines
- Clock background image
- Which calendars to show on the clock
- The thickness of the clock hands

Any and all feedback is appreciated and will be taken into consideration for future features and updates!

Note: Permission for reading to external storage is needed in order to use images from your SD card as the clock's background
